title: This game has Jumped The Shark
body:
Emotes... really?

I thought it was April Fools today when I logged in and saw this trash.

Then I laughed out loud when I realized you have to pay REAL MONEY to get them.

HAHAHAHAHA

It's bad enough I have to play with trashy children who try to surrender at 15 every game after 3 deaths.

Good thing Dota exists. Woo

Watch they are going to delete this thread because they are too big for their own good now. Don't be scared homies.

replies.body: What if I told you that DotA also has emotes?
i don't see why anyone would pay{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  5$ for these emotes that you can mute

Dota has cosmetics that costs $300+ for half the effects your average $10 League skin would get. (Arcanas in dota are nice though)

Plus an arguably worse lootbox system

But by all means...

Why do you care? It's a free game. Riot can sell whatever cosmetics they want. 

If you like them, then buy them. 

if you don't like them, then don't buy them.

Well, with rune pages gone, runes gone (so more IP for Champion buys you then wont buy with RP) and the free loot chests giving you free skins, you cant blame RIOT for trying to get another source of income. 

Think about it from a business perspective: now emotes will be in chests, reducing the chance of Skins or Champions to drop, which in return will increase the willingness of players to buy them with real money.

not only that but the message with these emotes is kinda offensive.....
''buy emotes now and don't die chatting anymore'' -.-
so basically riot tells every free to play player to go F...k themselves and die chatting V.V
